name: Mr. Marmelade
description:
Recent Version 19.02.2023

New  Modes ''Sweet'' and ''Sour'' for an increased challenge!
Mr. Marmelade enters a dungeon that bristles with 16 increasingly challenging mazes. 

Navigate through tight corridors and activate the switches on the floor to complete a room.
But beware: Once you hit a wall, you will be back to square one.

A precious reward awaits you if you reach the end...
... and if you make it without crashing, there is also a secret treasure.

Download the file and play it on the go!


Controls:

Arrow Keys: Move

Alt/Z/J: Text Interaction

This game was developed by Maro Schmidt.

Updates since release:

02-19-2023

- improved life indicator

- improved level design for Room 8 & 10

- fixed wall collision bug for all triggers
